text: If you go federal (U.S.) like I did there is hardly any leave when you start. I'm 6 months in and I accrue 4 hours per pay period. But I've been making do by asking for leave around holidays - and we are off  for a lot of those - For example, my summer vaca with my hubby and kids will be the week of Memorial Day so I only have to take 4 days etc. It is what it is. The benefits/pay overall outweigh the amount of leave days.
